Articles.Content:
When I'm trying to do things in the VAB, pressing certain keys will cause problems.

Specific examples:

1. Pressing DEL to erase a part pops up a notification that I've toggled between maneuver and docking controls.

2. Trying to use the letter "M" when naming any craft switches to map mode! None of my vessels can have the letter "M" in them. I guess I'll stick with K.
